reviewText: Well done interviews of important Black Americans in various fields.  I enjoyed it.

I bought 1 for myself and 1 for someone else
It's great to see and hear from others that have made a journey
documentary was pretty good, thought it could have been a little more informative with more examples for each area of development
The History Makers is an excellent documentary with an lot of useful info. on the subject matter.

Buy 10 & donate them to Libraries, share them with the younger generation, share them with all of your Family & Friends.  The series is well done and very much needed.  I've already shared it with a sister, brother, & a friend.
